Package paoo.game.object

Class ObjHeart

java.lang.Object
paoo.game.entity.Entity
paoo.game.object.ObjHeart
public class ObjHeart extends Entity
Represents a Heart object in the game. The Heart is used to display life/health status with multiple visual states.

    • ObjHeart

      public ObjHeart()
